title: Walk a Crooked Mile 1948 colorized (Louis Hayward)

sources.title: Walk a Crooked Mile 1948 colorized (Louis Hayward)
sources.description: During the Cold War, an FBI agent (Dennis O'Keefe) and a Scotland Yard inspector (Louis Hayward) join forces to track members of a communist spy ring (Raymond Burr, Philip Van Zandt) stealing secrets from an atomic research plant. Louis Hayward as Philip 'Scotty' Grayson Dennis O'Keefe as Daniel F. O'Hara Louise Allbritton as Dr. Toni Neva Carl Esmond as Dr. Ritter von Stolb Onslow Stevens as Igor Braun Raymond Burr as Krebs Art Baker as Dr. Frederick Townsend Lowell Gilmore as Dr. William Forrest Philip Van Zandt as Anton Radchek Charles Evans as Dr. Homer Allen Frank Ferguson as Carl Bemish Reed Hadley as Narrator Paul Bryar as Ivan (uncredited) John Hamilton as G.W. Hunter (uncredited) Myron Healey as Thompson - FBI Agent (uncredited) If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
